title: Demographic Form
description: Our research is supported by the US National Institutes of Health, which recognizes the importance of conducting research across a diverse distribution of participants in order to work toward health equity. We are collecting demographic information to assure that we live up to this aspiration. We appreciate that the racial/ethnic/gender categories are US-centric and not fully inclusive; but we must adhere to US government definitions. We would appreciate it if you can respond to the best of your ability. Your answers to these questions will remain confidential and will not be linked to your identity.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Are you a native English speaker?

choices.text: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
